    • How to read the radarcharts of the relative rigor score (RRS)

    Create a radial chart in pure HTML/CSS with equal sector angles

    Source: R/sparkcharts.R
    radial_chart.Rd

    This function creates a radial chart visualization using only HTML and CSS. Each sector has the same angular size and a radius proportional to its value.

    Usage

    radial_chart(
  values,
  colors = NULL,
  full_radius = TRUE,
  width = 300,
  height = 300,
  border_width = 1,
  border_color = "#cccccc",
  center_size = 0
)

    Arguments

    values

    numeric vector of values (0-1) representing how filled each sector should be

    colors

    character vector of colors for each sector

    width

    numeric width of the chart in pixels

    height

    numeric height of the chart in pixels

    border_width

    numeric width of the outer circle border

    border_color

    character color of the outer circle border

    center_size

    numeric size of the empty center (as percentage of total radius)

    Value

    a HTML string representing the radial chart

    Examples

    radial_chart(c(80, 60, 40, 90, 30))
#> Error in radial_chart(c(80, 60, 40, 90, 30)): object 'colors_100' not found
radial_chart(values=c(1, .5, .25, .1), center_size = 0)
#> Error in radial_chart(values = c(1, 0.5, 0.25, 0.1), center_size = 0): object 'colors_100' not found
